soot.jimple.infoflow.android.iccta

Class IccInstrumentDestination

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.android.iccta.IccInstrumentDestination

  • public class IccInstrumentDestination
extends Object
    One ICC Link contain one source component and one destination component. this class is used to collect all the assist methods which instrument destination component.

      • generateIntentFieldForActivityResult

        public soot.SootField generateIntentFieldForActivityResult(soot.SootClass compSootClass)
        create a field intent_for_activity_result in compSootClass since setResult(int, Intent) will be used to transfer intent back to source component which use startActivityResult to link this component. we use this field to store the special intent set by setResult()
        Parameters:
        compSootClass -
        Returns:

      • generateInitMethod

        public soot.SootMethod generateInitMethod(soot.SootClass compSootClass,
                                          soot.SootField intentSootField)
        generate construct method for this component, this construct method should take one Intent as their parameter. the best way is to use a place holder parameter to avoid exist construct method and use exist construct to build the new method.
        Parameters:
        compSootClass -
        intentSootField -
        Returns:
